Address.Address1: Jl. Kayu Aya, Seminyak Beach, PO Box 1085

Description.Text: The Seminyak Beach Resort & Spa is stylish beachfront resort that represents a new era in Bali's evolving hospitality industry. The property is all about tropical sophistication with a choice of elegantly appointed guest rooms, suites and villas designed to accommodate the needs of today's savvy travellers. Guest accommodation at The Seminyak extends to a comprehensive selection of rooms, suites, villas and even a penthouse to ensure that personal comfort is taken into careful consideration. Each category has its own unique character but with a shared design aesthetic that is essentially modern and accentuated by Balinese artistry. Set within a charming landscape that encompasses native greenery, lily ponds and traditional thatched pavilions, The Seminyak is a modern retreat with distinct Balinese touches that provides a welcome escape from the outside world. A signature brand of hospitality together with heartfelt service promises a truly unrivalled experience.

As its name indicates, The Seminyak is located in what has long been considered Bali's most vibrant lifestyle district. Seminyak is the ultimate place to experience some of the island's finest wining, dining and shopping alternatives. The resort is within easy walking distance to a number of popular hotspots. Yet beneath the glamour, Seminyak manages to somehow retain its cultural roots and life for the Balinese still revolves around an endless cycle of symbolic rituals. The nearby Petitenget Temple hosts regular ceremonies and is classic example of how Bali honours past traditions in an area that has fully embraced tourism. The Seminyak is just a leisurely 45 minute drive from Ngurah Rai International airport

The Villa One Bedroom Garden View - Ideal for couples who prefer to unwind in the privacy of their own Balinese inspired compound, this vila category embodies the concept of tropical living. It embraces the outdoors with an open-style design that incorporates a generous sized swimming pool and shaded relaxation pavilion. The bedroom is an adult sanctuary with its indulging en-suite bathroom and Jacuzzi. Located on beach side, 3 units one bedroom villa garden view of 190 m2 with private pool of 5m X 7m, open air Jacuzzi, living room, open air gazebo.

Guest room amenities : Rain shower, Standalone bathtub, "42 LCD TV, Satellite channel, DVD player, Wi-Fi internet connection, In room safety deposit box, IDD phone call, Hairdryer, Mini bar, iPods Docking Station, Tea/coffee making facilities, Individually controlled air conditioning, Private balcony, Choices of Pillows. The Villa One Bedroom Ocean View - Ideal for couples who prefer to unwind in the privacy of their own Balinese inspired compound, this vila category embodies the concept of tropical living. It embraces the outdoors with an open-style design that incorporates a generous sized swimming pool and shaded relaxation pavilion. The bedroom is an adult sanctuary with its indulging en-suite bathroom and Jacuzzi. Located on beach side, 7 units one bedroom villa over looking the ocean of 190 m2 with private pool of 5m X 7m, open air Jacuzzi, living room, open air gazebo.

Guest room amenities : Rain shower, Standalone bathtub, "42 LCD TV, Satellite channel, DVD player, Wi-Fi internet connection, In room safety deposit box, IDD phone call, Hairdryer, Mini bar, iPods Docking Station, Tea/coffee making facilities, Individually controlled air conditioning, Private balcony, Choices of Pillows. The Villa Two Bedroom Garden View - The two bedroom villa is a haven of relaxation nestled within the confines of a Balinese style garden compound. With its spacious living environment, family sized swimming pool and shaded outdoor pavilion, it is the perfect setting to enjoy quality leisure time in the company of loved ones. It has been designed to accommodate up to four adult guests in total comfort. Located on beach side, 1 unit two bedroom villa garden view of 318 m2 with two private pools of 5mX7m each, open air Jacuzzi, living room, open air gazebo.

Guest room amenities : Rain shower, Standalone bathtub, "42 LCD TV, Satellite channel, DVD player, Wi-Fi internet connection, In room safety deposit box, IDD phone call, Hairdryer, Mini bar, iPods Docking Station, Tea/coffee making facilities, Individually controlled air conditioning, Private balcony, Choices of Pillows. The Room Garden Wing - The Garden Wing room with garden view is designed for optimal comfort, this exclusive category reflects the warmth of the island and its people. A stylish decor brings together hardwood floors, an earthy colour palette and decorative pieces inspired by Bali's artistic heritage. It is a restful environment that soothes the senses and comes complete with a lavish bathroom facility and private balcony. Standard room offers one king bed. This room is located at the opposite of the main building and across to the street

Guest room amenities : Rain shower, Standalone bathtub, "42 LCD TV, Satellite channel, DVD player, Wi-Fi internet connection, In room safety deposit box, IDD phone call, Hairdryer, Mini bar, iPods Docking Station, Tea/coffee making facilities, Individually controlled air conditioning, Private balcony, Choices of Pillows. The Room Beach Wing - The Beach Wing room with beach view is designed for optimal comfort, this exclusive category reflects the warmth of the island and its people. A stylish decor brings together hardwood floors, an earthy colour palette and decorative pieces inspired by Bali's artistic heritage. It is a restful environment that soothes the senses and comes complete with a lavish bathroom facility and private balcony. Standard room offers one king bed.

Guest room amenities : Rain shower, Standalone bathtub, "42 LCD TV, Satellite channel, DVD player, Wi-Fi internet connection, In room safety deposit box, IDD phone call, Hairdryer, Mini bar, iPods Docking Station, Tea/coffee making facilities, Individually controlled air conditioning, Private balcony, Choices of Pillows. The Suite - The Suite is a well-appointed accommodation category that celebrates island sophistication. It is an inviting space that gives local artistry a new lease of life by reinterpreting classic Balinese design elements. Modern yet functional furnishings take personal comfort to the next level while a Jacuzzi overlooking the ocean provides the ultimate in bath time luxury. Deluxe Suite offers one king bed.

Guest room amenities : Rain shower, Standalone bathtub (The Room's only), "42 LCD TV, Satellite channel, DVD player, Wi-Fi internet connection, In room safety deposit box, IDD phone call, Hairdryer, Mini bar, iPods Docking Station, Private Jacuzzi, Tea/coffee making facilities, Individually controlled air conditioning, Private balcony, Choices of Pillows.
